I'm collecting them - will see if I can write up something when new
ideas have stopped coming in.

-pam

On Apr 1, 2005, at 6:21 AM, Brenda Rose wrote:

> Pam, could we group all of these somewhere?

messages.subject: Adding to Pam's List was Need advice/reassurance...
messages.msgSnippet: Sitting still, standing straight and being silent are good; wiggling, moving, socializing are bad. Eating, drinking, and bathroom use are done on [someone
messages.messageBody:
Sitting still, standing straight and being silent are good;
wiggling, moving, "socializing" are bad.

Eating, drinking, and bathroom use are done on [someone else's] schedule.

Conformity

How to mock those who don't conform.

Lots of things your parents wish you didn't know.

Classification of people: nerds, preps, jocks, etc.

Fear of adults and their power.


Pam, could we group all of these somewhere?

Brenda Rose
